title: Definitions
context: [ยง346C-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Activities of daily living&rdquo; means at least bathing, continence, dressing, eating, toileting, and transferring. &ldquo;Board of trustees&rdquo; means the board of trustees charged with the general administration of this program under section 346C-3. &ldquo;Long-term care services&rdquo; means a broad range of supportive services needed by individuals with physical or mental impairments and have lost or never acquired the ability to function independently. &ldquo;Program&rdquo; means the long-term care financing program set forth in this chapter. [L 2002, c 245, pt of ยง2]
